languages.text: Grants +5 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +2 to all types of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt for each stack of dark blessing until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Дарует +5 временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} и +2 ко всему исходящему {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} за каждый полученный уровень темного благословения до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Grants +5 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +2 to all types of damage dealt for each stack of dark blessing until the end of combat.

Gewährt bis zum Ende des Kampfes für jeden Stapel "Dunkler Segen" +5 temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} und +2 auf alle verursachten {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadenstypen{/g}.
languages.original_text: Grants +5 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +2 to all types of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt for each stack of dark blessing until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Gewährt bis zum Ende des Kampfes für jede Aufaddierung von Dunkler Seegen +5 temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} und +2 auf alle zugefügten Schadenstypen.

languages.text: Confère +5 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires et +2 points à tous les types de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés pour chaque cumul de Bénédiction des ténèbres jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Grants +5 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +2 to all types of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt for each stack of dark blessing until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Confère +5 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires et +2 points à tous les types de dégâts infligés pour chaque cumul de Bénédiction des Ténèbres jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: 每层“黑暗祝福”会提供5点临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，使造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高2点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Grants +5 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +2 to all types of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt for each stack of dark blessing until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 每层“黑暗祝福”会提供5点临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，使造成的所有伤害提高2点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Concede +5 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales y +2 a todos los tipos de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} infligidos por cada acumulación de bendición oscura hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Grants +5 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +2 to all types of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt for each stack of dark blessing until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Concede +5 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales y +2 a todos los tipos de daño infligidos por cada acumulación de bendición oscura hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: 戦闘終了時まで、一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g} +5、および闇の祝福で累積されるあらゆるタイプの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に+2を付与する。
languages.original_text: Grants +5 temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +2 to all types of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt for each stack of dark blessing until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘終了時まで、一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g} +5、および闇の祝福で累積されるあらゆるタイプのダメージに +2を付与する。

languages.text: Her bir kara lütuf birikimi için +5 geçici {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı ve verilen tüm {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} türlerine +2 kazandırır. Etkisi, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
